---
title: CONCEPT CONTROLS
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: concept_controls
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CONCEPT CONTROLS. The average
  contract duration was 0.32 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $84.6K.
  The longest contract was 5.41 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $2.8M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '87'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '4'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '5%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '24%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '839.0K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.32'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '84.6K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5.41'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '2.8M'
---
